## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have fixed any linting issues (`npm run lint`)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`npm test`)
- [ ] I have tested the changes in a Codespaces environment
- [ ] I have verified the changes work in Docker Compose (`docker-compose up`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README.md, docs/, wiki_content/)
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation in `docs/API.md` (if endpoints changed)
- [ ] I have updated `docs/CONFIGURATION.md` (if environment variables changed)
- [ ] I have updated `docs/ARCHITECTURE.md` (if architecture changed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md with my changes

### Breaking Changes

<!-- If this PR introduces breaking changes, complete this section -->

- [ ] This PR introduces breaking changes
- [ ] I have documented the breaking changes in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have updated the migration guide or created one
